name: ChatHRD: The Two Heroes - ChatBot RPG
name_original: ChatHRD: The Two Heroes - ChatBot RPG
description:
Main features
- Chatbot Harold
- Intriguing story
- Fourth wall breaking feature
- Friendship with Harold

Just type to chat with Harold ~

Premise
ChatHRD: The Two Heroes, the puzzle game that'll keep you glued to your screen! In this unique game, you'll chat with Harold, the brave hero, and solve puzzles to save his fallen hero, Reid.

With its intuitive chat system and innovative gameplay mechanics, ChatHRD: The Two Heroes offers an unforgettable gaming experience that's perfect for puzzle fans and adventure seekers alike. And if you're not a puzzle pro, don't worry - you can always access hints from items scattered throughout the game.

ChatHRD: The Two Heroes is perfect for those who love a good story and a challenge, featuring the journey of Harold and a playable time of around 45 minutes.

So why wait? Join Harold on his quest to save(defeat) Reid and experience the thrill and excitement of ChatHRD: The Two Heroes today!

Who is Harold?
Harold is Harold. He is a legend.
This is a game jam held for him.
https://itch.io/jam/haroldjam23

Please report bugs if any. Would be appreciated if you can tell me bugs I missed.

Streaming is more than welcome.
